sentence.Network_en: He was in direct contravention of the law.
This was a clear contravention of the rules.
The government has lent millions of pounds to debt-ridden banks in contravention of local banking laws.
sentence.Network_cn: 政府无视当地的金融法规，已向负债累累的银行出借了数百万英镑。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语常见词根前缀后缀大全 ... convention 会议 contravention 违反，抵触 convert 转移.

gulch的翻译查词例句词组大耳朵英语 ...  contravention 违反, 违背, 矛盾 ... well-to-do 富有的, 小康的, 富裕的.
拘禁适用于违警罪（contravention）。当然,罚金也适用于违警罪。

list.abs: the evolution of contravention law in modern chinese history ., 中国近代违警罚法的沿革.
l’infractionLes contraventions 背警功Cinq classes selon leur gravité
This was a clear contravention of the rules ., 这明显违反了规则.
relevant contract 有关合约relevant contravention 违例事件relevant corporation 相关法团
有关条件 relevant contract有关合约 relevant contravention违例事件 relevant corporation

jx.jx_en_mean: in a manner contrary and disobedient to (a law or other ruling)
jx.jx_cn_mean: 违反，违背（法律、其他规定）

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: via French from medieval Latin contraventio(n-), from late Latin contravenire (see contravene)

entry.tran: 违反，违背，触犯(法律或规则)
entry.def: To contravene a law or rule means to do something that is forbidden by the law or rule.

example.ex: The Board has banned the film on the grounds that it contravenes criminal libel laws...
example.tran: 委员会决定禁播这部电影，理由是它触犯了刑事诽谤法。

example.ex: He said the article did not contravene the industry's code of conduct.
example.tran: 他说这一条款并未违反行业的行为准则。

auth_sentence.content: Iraq has deliberately hid the weapons, in contravention of international agreements.
auth_sentence.res_content: Iraq has deliberately hid the weapons, in contravention of international agreements.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Iraq has deliberately hid the weapons, in contravention of international agreements.

auth_sentence.content: In contravention of the plea agreement, Judge Robinson sentenced Pollard to life.
auth_sentence.res_content: In contravention of the plea agreement, Judge Robinson sentenced Pollard to life.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In contravention of the plea agreement, Judge Robinson sentenced Pollard to life.

auth_sentence.content: The dealers...in direct contravention of their professed object in life, had refused to deal.
auth_sentence.res_content: The dealers...in direct contravention of their professed object in life, had refused to deal.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The dealers...in direct contravention of their professed object in life, had refused to deal.

sentences.en: This was a clear contravention of the rules.
He was in direct contravention of the law.
